alert.note: Alert for La Porte; Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 01 at 12:04AM EDT until April 01 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT/2 AM EDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of north central Indiana and northern Indiana, including the following counties, in north central Indiana, St. Joseph. In northern Indiana, La Porte, Marshall and Starke. * WHEN...Until 100 AM CDT /200 AM EDT/. * IMPACTS...Street flooding in South Bend. Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1059 PM CDT /1159 PM EDT/, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Street flooding has been reported by spotters in South Bend. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... South Bend, Mishawaka, Georgetown, Gulivoire Park, Walkerton, North Liberty, Kingsford Heights, Wanatah, Hamlet, Lakeville, Roseland, Koontz Lake, Hanna, Kingsbury, Indian Village, Fish Lake, Stillwell, Salem Heights, South Center and Teegarden. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: La Porte; Marshall; St. Joseph; Starke
